description:
"This is frustrating. We want to do a good job, but we keep making mistakes."
Kuga Issei and Kuga Ichiru are chosen to appear in a new musical by a popular director.
In a story based on the Grimm Fairy Tale, Issei and Ichiru are cast in roles that remind them of their own upbringing.
Though rehearsing for their first real show leaves them feeling uncertain, they put forth their best effort, but...
Source: crunchyroll
